Cauliflower gratin

free recipe

  • 300 g mushrooms
  • 1 cauliflower head
  • 1 broccoli
  • 2 cloves of garlic
  • 2 tbsp butter
  • 2 tbsp all-purpose flour
  • 2 dl milk
  • 1 dl cream
  • 1 tsp salt
  • 1/2 tsp black pepper
  • 1 dl grated cheese
Make this gratin now!
